headline: Loews (L) Margin Miss Challenges Bullish Narratives on Profit Resilience
summary: Loews (L) posted high-quality earnings over the past five years, growing earnings by an impressive 32% per year in that stretch. Most recently, however, profitability came under pressure, with the net profit margin at 7.5%, down from 9.1% a year earlier. The company also experienced negative earnings growth for the latest period. For investors, Loews remains valued attractively versus peers, with a price-to-earnings ratio of 15.3x. Its shares trade above fair value estimates and recent margin...
